programme.desc: The storyline revolves around a student who abandons his studies after his parents’ death, and joins a traveling circus. Where he works as a veterinarian, he meets a beautiful girl and falls in love with her.(n)

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a remote town near the edge of the magical land, Tristan promises his beloved that he will search for a fallen star for her, embarking on a journey of magical adventures in the process.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: After his arrest with the help of Newt Scamander, Grindelwald manages to escape from the grip of the Magical Congress of the United States of America and sets out to gather his followers. Albus Dumbledore decides to enlist Scamander in order to defeat this upcoming danger.(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: The repressed Panem is on the verge of rebellion as 74th Hunger Game victors Katniss and Peeta visit the districts on their victory tour. The two have become symbols of defiance against the Capitol, and for that they will be targeted by the despotic President Snow and his regime.(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 1
programme.desc: Katniss finds herself in District 13 after she literally shatters the game forever, faced with a decision that could sway the fate of her nation. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss reluctantly becomes the symbol of mass revolution against the autocratic Capitol.(n)

programme.title: A Simple Favor
programme.desc: Stephanie, a mother who works as a blogger, seeks to discover the mystery of the disappearance of her friend Emily from the city by joining her friend's husband, where everyone is subjected to love and loyalty tests and secrets that could cause murder and revenge.

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: A remake of the 1988 “Dirty little scoundrels”, starring Anne Hathaway and Rebel Wilson as two scam artist trying their best shot at conning a filthy rich Tech wonder.

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along film.James and Ben team up again for a second Ride Along, and try to bust some drug dealing operations in Miami, before Ben’s wedding to James’ sister.

programme.title: Parker
programme.desc: Parker is a thief with a moral code. When he is deceived by four guys after a heist and left for dead, he becomes determined to get back at them. Taking on a new identity to infiltrate their gang, he enlists the help of a woman on the inside.

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: After an injury ends her career, world-class skier Molly Bloom starts running an exclusive underground poker empire, but she soon lands herself in trouble after the FBI exposes her operation.

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: When his ten-year-old son goes missing, detective Tom Adkins tries to deal with his disappearance as he receives a phone call leading him to a box where the mummified remains of a boy have been kept for fifty years. As Tom tries to solve the mystery, he finds himself on the edge of insanity.

programme.title: Takers
programme.desc: A group of robbers attempt to steal $20 million while a police officer gets in the way and events follow.

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.

programme.title: A Most Violent Year
programme.desc: Set in 1981, the film focuses on the story of Abel Morales, who emigrated to the United States and becomes one of the most successful businessmen there until one of the waves of violence and corruption comes threatening to destroy everything he built for himself and his family.

programme.title: Killing Them Softly
programme.desc: Jackie Cogan (Brad Pitt) is a paid assassin who is hired to find the robbers of a Mob protected card game; that caused the local criminal economy to fall apart.

programme.desc: Parker is a thief with a moral code. When he is deceived by four guys after a heist and left for dead, he becomes determined to get back at them. Taking on a new identity to infiltrate their gang, he enlists the help of a woman on the inside.

programme.title: City Slickers
programme.desc: A man facing a midlife crisis joins his two friends as they go on a cattle drive across the Southwest. Their journey reveals to them more about themselves and helps them conquer their fear of aging.

programme.title: Moonrise Kingdom
programme.desc: Set in the sixties, in an island in New England, a 12-year-old boy and girl fall in love and secretly plan to run away together. This angers the authorities in the island, and the situation escalates to the point where they attempt to track the young couple in all directions.

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: After a sour breakup, Clementine and Joel undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memory, but while their minds are being swept clean from their shared past, Joel tries to hold onto one last memory to be their safe haven, hoping for the prospect of a new, future encounter.

programme.title: The Shape of Water
programme.desc: An otherworldly fable set against the backdrop of Cold War between the United States and the former Soviet Union, in the hidden high-security government laboratory, Elisa lives in absolute isolation, when her life changes forever after discovering a secret scientific experiment with her colleague Zelda.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: The 17-year-old Nadine tries to make sense of the challenges thrown down her way as she grows up, suffering the depression of losing her father, and a shattered friendship with Krista who dates Nadine's brother, Darian. Nadine finds solace with her teacher, Mr. Bruner, and a talented classmate.

programme.title: The House of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An unlikely bond forms between an isolated teen who longs to break out of his sheltered life with his grandmother, and a punk rock lover who has a heart condition. Through the music of punk rock, the two young men end up inspiring each other and changing both of their lives.

programme.desc: Ryan Bingham is a man with a very odd job. He travels to offices across the United States in order to execute layoffs. Around the same time an architect that is remodeling Jane’s house, Adam, also enters the picture as a potential romantic interest.(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: A Women lives near-perfect life: marriage is great, children precede her age, home of breathtaking view, but the progress of her career is frustrating, even though she works double effort, and highly committed, with all the frustrations she faces, she is about to reach the point of explosion, which get her forming an alliance with a group of other mothers to overcome all their routine lives.(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: After a successful businesswoman is brought down due to illegal transactions, she has to start back from scratch after her release from prison. programme.title: Dog Days
programme.desc: The lives of a group of people from different social and economic backgrounds intersect through the shenanigans of their dogs.

programme.title: The Cave
programme.desc: A group of divers are sent to explore a network of deep caves where unknown creatures with cannibalistic behavior lurk.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, reluctantly joins The Bellas, the school's female acapella group. Beca shakes up the group's tired repertoire with some fresh ideas and leads the group to nationals, where they take on their crowd-pleasing male rivals.

programme.title: Changeling
programme.desc: A single mother confronts corrupt police officers when they inform her that her missing child is found. She suspects that the child is not hers and after numerous complaints and presenting evidence to prove her claims she gets detained in a mental institution, which holds other women who stepped on police's toes.

programme.title: Metal Heart
programme.desc: With a mysterious man moving in next door, the rivalry between the two sisters Emma and Chantal, who are the complete opposite of one another, comes to a head.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember
programme.desc: When the reckless teenager Landon Carter gets into trouble, he's forced to participate in a school play as part of his community service activities. He meets the reverend's daughter Jamie Sullivan, and they develop a bond that changes their lives forever.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: An A cappella group enter into an international competition that no American team has ever won before.

programme.title: The Clovehitch Killer
programme.desc: Ten years after a serial killer terrorized a local community, a young boy starts to suspect that his father is the infamous Clovehitch killer after he finds suspicious photos in his possession.

programme.title: Tyrel
programme.desc: Tyrel goes to a birthday party with his friend, where he finds he’s the only african-american man there; he gets suspicious and fearful when he finds everyone there is drunk, and things start to get aggravated.
